title: Teriyaki salmon
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons sesame oil', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons soft brown sugar, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '4 salmon steaks']
